title: #240 – Neal Stephenson: Sci-Fi, Space, Aliens, AI, VR & the Future of Humanity
description: Neal Stephenson is a sci-fi writer (Snow Crash, Cryptonomicon, and new book Termination Shock), former Chief Futurist at Magic Leap and first employee of Blue Origin.
